name: Automattic
goal: Our aim is to democratize publishing on the web. We seek to achieve this through the provision and operation of the WordPress.com online platform, and associated products and services.
interests: Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: We have had minimum involvement in previous EU initiatives or consultations, and have only contributed to the following so far: "Public consultation on the regulatory environment for platforms, online intermediaries, data and cloud computing and the collaborative economy"
